https://tmrev.io/movie/272414-Echo Park 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bGrH230zS5MgQGlurObARdD33C0.jpg Desperate to jar herself from the rich tedium of picture-perfect Beverly Hills, Sophie moves across town to another world: Echo Park. She quickly strikes up an unexpected connection with Alex, a handsome neighbor and British expat who is reluctantly selling his beloved home to move back to London. As the summer passes, a romance driven by uncertainty compels them to reassess where each belongs. Echo Park
